Context:
George Brown College offers various programs. For program-specific inquiries, contact the respective school or department directly using the provided contacts below:

School of Health Sciences and Nursing:
- Phone: 416-415-2000
- TTY: 1-877-515-5559
- Email: ask.george@georgebrown.ca

For transcripts, credentials, graduation, GPA, confirmation of enrolments, foreign nursing license requests or other records related inquiries:
- Complete the request form on their website
- Allow 2 to 3 business days for a response

General college inquiries and sign up for news, tours, and events:
- Visit Their Social Media Hub

Contact Information:
- Phone: 416-415-2000
- Email: ask.george@georgebrown.ca

Website: https://www.georgebrown.ca/

Locations:
- St. James Campus: 295 Adelaide St E, Toronto, ON M5B 1K1, Canada
- Waterfront Campus: 51 Dockside Dr, Toronto, ON M5A 0B4, Canada

College Hours of Operation:
- Monday to Friday: 8:30am - 5pm EST
- Saturday and Sunday: Closed

George Brown College offers programs in various fields including health sciences and nursing. For specific program information or inquiries, contact the respective school or department using the provided contacts above. Students can also request transcripts, graduation documents, or other records-related information on their website. General college inquiries, news, tours, and events sign up can be made through their social media hub. The college is located at two campuses in Toronto, with operating hours from 8:30am to 5pm EST, Monday to Friday, and closed on weekends.
